title: login issues
body: Why cant't i login even though i allready had reinstalled the game.plz help me

replies.body: After looking over your account, it looks like someone else might have been able to sign on other than yourself!! Chances are, someone was able to change your password without you knowing! I strongly suggest you reach out to us in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so that we can help you secure your account.
